definition: the act of giving a formal, usually written, authorization, authorize officially
details:
noun
- the act of giving a formal, usually written, authorization
= example: the act of giving a formal, usually written, authorization
= synonyms: permission, permit
- a legal document giving official permission to do something
= synonyms: permit, licence
- freedom to deviate deliberately from normally applicable rules or practices (especially in behavior or speech)
= synonyms: licence
- excessive freedom
= synonyms: licence
verb
- authorize officially
= example: authorize officially
= synonyms: licence, certify
